title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1631-2.5 - Services offered by division personnel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1631-2.5 - Services offered by division personnel

State Regulations

Periodic visits are made to each development by
division personnel. Any problems affecting safety should be discussed with
these men. If they are unable to provide you with the necessary information, they will take such action as will be deemed necessary to obtain that
information. In addition, the authority should forward any problems or
questions directly to the division's Bureau of Management. Such inquiries will
be answered as quickly as possible. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1631-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
